text: Embryophytes are land plants. They are the most familiar kinds of plants, the bryophytes, ferns, gymnosperms and flowering plants. Only a few embryophytes are water plants. They don't include the algae. They include the Bryophytes and the vascular plants. Embryophytes started sometime between the mid- Cambrian and the Ordovician period. Their ancestors were green algae. Category:Plant taxonomy
title: Embryophyte
